DataChecksum.Ignore: DisplayName, ShortName, Capitol, Description, UnitSkinColor, UnitHairColor, UnitClothColor, BuildingPrimaryColor, BuildingSecondaryColor, BuildingRoofColor, BuildingStyle, UnitStyle, WorkerName

FlavorText.Text: Hail [L_LeaderName]. Respect to you and the people of [L_FactionShortName]. Let us mark our borders so the bounds of our sovereignty be known to all.
Good wishes [L_LeaderName]. Peace be with you and the people of [L_FactionShortName].
Good day, [L_LeaderName] of [L_FactionShortName]. The Kingdom of Isoth is not a place for outsiders. We wish you well on your journey.
What strange fate it is that we should cross paths, [L_LeaderName] of [L_FactionShortName]. I hope it is a sign of good times for both our nations.
Hold [L_LeaderName], the Dremorian Nation greets you but is mindful of foreigners.
Fair travels [L_LeaderName] of [L_FactionShortName]. The people of Urns wish you well should your intentions be peaceful.
The Kingdom of Otaran bids you welcome, [L_LeaderName] of [L_FactionShortName]. May our nations prosper from this newfound acquaintance.
Well met [L_LeaderName], you are a traveller? No doubt you wish to visit Cormenlon, the grandest kingdom in Elemental!
Have you heard of the Weaving, I wonder - [L_LeaderName]? Tell your masters it is the magi of Xaroch, that are the greatest channelers in Elemental.
You are of [L_FactionShortName]? The Thuhl have not heard of this place - it must not be as mighty an empire as our own.
[L_LeaderName] - we have met. This changes nothing.
So, [L_LeaderName] of [L_FactionShortName]... there are powers that deem we should cross paths.
Gorgal has many allies and many enemies [L_LeaderName], in time we will see which of these the [L_FactionName] will be.
Greetings [L_LeaderName] of [L_FactionShortName]. Know that the Empire of Morqai can be a great ally to your nation, should there be mutual benefit.
Ah, [L_LeaderName] yes - I have heard that name perhaps. And you I am sure, will have heard of the mighty Gaushon warriors, and Urner, greatest amongst them.
